com.imperio

Class ErrorHandlerPrint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.imperio.ErrorHandlerPrint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ErrorHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ErrorHandlerException, ErrorHandlerExit

    public class ErrorHandlerPrint
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorHandler
    This ErrorHandler prints any errors to System.err and any warnings to System.out.
    Since:
    1.0.0
